pullrequest.title: Word-wrapping in treeviews and item views, adapted from David Meyer's implementation.

content.raw:
Sorry for a delayed response. The powers that be where I work have decided that Bitbucket has/had a piece of malware on it and blocked our access to the entire site. I’m having to use a jump stick to get changes for the time being.

Anyway, everything looks good enough to me. For the sake of completeness I have noticed that multi-line editing highlights have two highlight boxes overlapping each other \(the smaller box always corresponds to the first line\). Unless it is obvious what’s causing it, I doubt it is worth fixing.

![](data/bitbucket.org/repo/6g5bg5/images/715969769-test.png)
content.html:
Sorry for a delayed response. The powers that be where I work have decided that Bitbucket has/had a piece of malware on it and blocked our access to the entire site. I’m having to use a jump stick to get changes for the time being.

Anyway, everything looks good enough to me. For the sake of completeness I have noticed that multi-line editing highlights have two highlight boxes overlapping each other (the smaller box always corresponds to the first line). Unless it is obvious what’s causing it, I doubt it is worth fixing.
